alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 11:17PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chambers, south central Liberty and southeastern Harris Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrisburg / Manchester, or over Galena Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Pasadena, Baytown, Deer Park, South Houston, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Cloverleaf, Downtown Houston, Second Ward, Highlands, Barrett, Greater Eastwood, Greater Fifth Ward, Greater Hobby Area, Channelview, Greater Third Ward, Macgregor, Midtown Houston, Crosby and Mont Belvieu. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
